title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: There are several Linea faucets available, such as:Infura Linea Faucet (0.5 ETH/day): infura.io/faucet/lineaLinea Goerli Testnet Faucet (0.5 ETH/day): faucet.goerli.linea.buildEchodex Linea Faucet (0.09 ETH/day): faucet.echodex.ioThese faucets allow you to request free Linea ETH token by connecting your wallet and selecting the appropriate network.The main Linea faucet is powered by Infura, a platform that provides developers with access to Ethereum infrastructure.Learn more about Linea Faucet and Linea Testnet RPC in our article.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: I checked this Linea faucet that you are talking about and I said that it should be in my metamask wallet, that's why this is the reason why I can't continue to advertise it in my metamask because it could harm my desktop and I might even become a victim of phishing because of what you posted OP.So for those who try to add this to your network in your metamask, please research carefully before doing it in your metamask account. So for me it's not okay, based on what I've seen.
